alert.note: Alert for Choctaw; Pushmataha (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 02 at 10:59PM CDT until May 02 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Pushmataha County in southeastern Oklahoma... Choctaw County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 1130 PM CDT. * At 1059 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles southwest of Antlers to 2 miles northwest of Bennington, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Hugo... Antlers... Boswell... Fort Towson... Sawyer... Soper... Hugo Lake State Park... Kellond... Kent... Goodland... Messer... Moyers... Raymond Gary State Park... Kosoma... Dunbar... Grant... Ord... Fallon... Sobol... Frogville... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
